languages.text: "Ну ты и дурак. Губернатор тебя поставил тут умирать, сам в тылу сидит, а ты про славу орешь".

traits.locale_text: "Какой же ты наивный! Кого ты тут защищаешь? Губернатора? Для него ты просто пушечное мясо, жизнь которого ничего не стоит".

languages.text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."
languages.original_text: "Ну ты и дурак. Губернатор тебя поставил тут умирать, сам в тылу сидит, а ты про славу орешь".

traits.locale_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, fantasising about glory."
"You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, fantasising about glory."
"You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching glory."
"You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching glory."
"You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."
"You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein Narr. Der Gouverneur sitzt gemütlich und sicher irgendwo in weiter Ferne und hält Euch für tot. Und Ihr predigt hier von Ruhm und Ehre."
languages.original_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein Narr. Der Gouverneur sitzt gemütlich und sicher irgendwo in weiter Ferne und hält Euch für tot. Und hier predigt hier von Ruhm und Ehre."

languages.text: « Imbécile... Le gouverneur est en sûreté à l'arrière, il vous abandonne à votre sort et vous, vous le glorifiez ! »
languages.original_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

traits.locale_text: « Imbécile... Le gouverneur est en sûreté à l'arrière, il vous abandonne à votre sort et vous, vous le glorifiez ! »

languages.text: “你真是个蠢货。总督在后方快活自在，把你丢在这里送死，而你却在这傻乎乎地宣扬什么荣耀。”
languages.original_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

traits.locale_text: “你真是个蠢货。总督在后方快活自在，把你丢在这里送死，而你却在这傻乎乎地宣扬什么荣耀。”

languages.text: 「愚かな。後方の安全な場所で総督がお前を見殺しにしているのに、お前はここで栄光を語るのか」
languages.original_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

traits.locale_text: 「愚かな。後方の安全な場所で総督が君を見殺しにしているのに、君はここで栄光を語るのか」

languages.text: «Es usted idiota. El gobernador, que está sano y salvo en la retaguardia, le ha dado por muerto, y aquí está, predicando su gloria».
languages.original_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted idiota. El gobernador, que está sano y salvo en la retaguardia, le ha dado por muerto, y aquí está, predicando su gloria».

languages.text: "Aptal herif. Vali kendini sağlama alıp sizi ölüme terk etmiş, sense burada beylik zafer lafları veriyorsun."
languages.original_text: "You are a fool. The governor, who is safe and sound in the rear, has left you for dead, and here you are, preaching about glory."

traits.locale_text: "Aptal herif. Vali kendini sağlama alıp sizi ölüme terk etmiş, sense burada beylik zafer lafları veriyorsun."
